00042 KosmosBroker::KosmosBroker(PropertiesPtr &cfg) {
00043   m_verbose = cfg->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose");
00044 
00045   String meta_name = cfg->get_str("Kfs.MetaServer.Name");
00046   int meta_port = cfg->get_i16("Kfs.MetaServer.Port");
00047 
00048   KfsClientPtr kfsclient = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient(meta_name,
00049                                                                  meta_port);
00050   KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->SetDefaultClient(kfsclient);
00051 }

00061 void
00062 KosmosBroker::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname,
00063                    uint32_t bufsz) {
00064   int fd;
00065   String abspath;
00066   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00067 
00068   HT_DEBUGF("open file='%s' bufsz=%d", fname, bufsz);
00069 
00070   if (fname[0] == '/')
00071     abspath = fname;
00072   else
00073     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00074 
00075   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Open file: " << abspath << HT_END;
00076 
00077   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_uniq_id);
00078 
00082   if ((fd = clnt->Open(abspath.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00083     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(fd);
00084     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00085     ReportError(cb, fd);
00086     return;
00087   }
00088 
00089   {
00090     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00091     OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataKosmos(fd, O_RDONLY));
00092 
00093     cb->get_address(addr);
00094 
00095     HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Got fd for file: " << abspath << HT_END;
00096 
00097     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00098 
00099     HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Inserted fd into open file map for file: "<< abspath
00100                  << HT_END;
00101     cb->response(fd);
00102   }
00103 }

00109 void
00110 KosmosBroker::create(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname,
00111     bool overwrite, int32_t bufsz, int16_t replication, int64_t blksz) {
00112   int fd;
00113   int flags;
00114   String abspath;
00115   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00116 
00117   HT_DEBUGF("create file='%s' overwrite=%d bufsz=%d replication=%d blksz=%lld",
00118             fname, (int)overwrite, (int)bufsz, (int)replication, (Lld)blksz);
00119 
00120   if (fname[0] == '/')
00121     abspath = fname;
00122   else
00123     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00124 
00125 
00126   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_uniq_id);
00127 
00128   if (overwrite)
00129     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC;
00130   else
00131     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_APPEND;
00132 
00133   HT_ERROR_OUT << "Create file: " << abspath << " " << flags << HT_END;
00134 
00138   if ((fd = clnt->Open(abspath.c_str(), flags)) < 0) {
00139     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(fd);
00140     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Create failed: " << errmsg << HT_END;
00141 
00142     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00143     ReportError(cb, fd);
00144     return;
00145   }
00146 
00147   {
00148     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00149     OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataKosmos(fd, O_WRONLY));
00150 
00151     cb->get_address(addr);
00152 
00153     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00154 
00155     cb->response(fd);
00156   }
00157 }

00163 void KosmosBroker::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00164   if (m_verbose) {
00165     HT_INFOF("close fd=%d", fd);
00166   }
00167 
00168   m_open_file_map.remove(fd);
00169 
00170   cb->response_ok();
00171 }

00177 void
00178 KosmosBroker::read(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount) {
00179   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00180   ssize_t nread;
00181   uint64_t offset;
00182   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00183   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00184 
00185   if (m_verbose) {
00186     HT_INFOF("read fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00187   }
00188 
00189   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00190     char errbuf[32];
00191     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00192     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00193     return;
00194   }
00195 
00196   offset = clnt->Tell(fdata->fd);
00197 
00198   if ((nread = clnt->Read(fdata->fd, (char *) buf.base, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00199     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nread);
00200     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00201               errmsg.c_str());
00202     ReportError(cb, nread);
00203     return;
00204   }
00205 
00206   buf.size = nread;
00207 
00208   cb->response(offset, buf);
00209 
00210 }

00216 void
00217 KosmosBroker::append(ResponseCallbackAppend *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount,
00218                      const void *data, bool sync) {
00219   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00220   ssize_t nwritten;
00221   uint64_t offset;
00222   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00223   int res;
00224 
00225   HT_DEBUGF("append fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00226 
00227   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00228     char errbuf[32];
00229     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00230     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00231     return;
00232   }
00233 
00234   offset = clnt->Tell(fdata->fd);
00235 
00236   if ((nwritten = clnt->Write(fdata->fd, (const char *) data, (size_t) amount))
00237       < 0) {
00238     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nwritten);
00239     HT_ERRORF("write failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00240               errmsg.c_str());
00241     ReportError(cb, nwritten);
00242     return;
00243   }
00244 
00245   if (sync && (res = clnt->Sync(fdata->fd)) < 0) {
00246     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00247     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, errmsg.c_str());
00248     ReportError(cb, res);
00249     return;
00250   }
00251 
00252   cb->response(offset, nwritten);
00253 
00254   return;
00255 }

00261 void KosmosBroker::seek(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset) {
00262   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00263   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00264 
00265   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00266     char errbuf[32];
00267     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00268     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00269     return;
00270   }
00271 
00272   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET))
00273       == (uint64_t) -1) {
00274     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset);
00275     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd, (Llu)offset,
00276               errmsg.c_str());
00277     ReportError(cb, (int) offset);
00278     return;
00279   }
00280 
00281   cb->response_ok();
00282 }

00288 void KosmosBroker::remove(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *fname) {
00289   String abspath;
00290   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00291   int res;
00292 
00293   HT_DEBUGF("remove file='%s'", fname);
00294 
00295   if (fname[0] == '/')
00296     abspath = fname;
00297   else
00298     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00299 
00300   if ((res = clnt->Remove(abspath.c_str())) < 0) {
00301     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00302     HT_ERRORF("unlink failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00303     ReportError(cb, res);
00304     return;
00305   }
00306 
00307   cb->response_ok();
00308 }

00314 void KosmosBroker::length(ResponseCallbackLength *cb, const char *fname) {
00315   String abspath;
00316   uint64_t length;
00317   int res;
00318   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00319   struct stat statbuf;
00320 
00321    HT_DEBUGF("length file='%s'", fname);
00322 
00323   if (fname[0] == '/')
00324     abspath = fname;
00325   else
00326     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00327 
00328   if ((res = clnt->Stat(abspath.c_str(), statbuf)) < 0) {
00329     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00330     HT_ERRORF("length (stat) failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(),
00331               errmsg.c_str());
00332     ReportError(cb, res);
00333     return;
00334   }
00335   length = statbuf.st_size;
00336   cb->response(length);
00337 }

00343 void
00344 KosmosBroker::pread(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset,
00345                     uint32_t amount) {
00346   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00347   ssize_t nread;
00348   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00349   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00350 
00351   HT_DEBUGF("pread fd=%d offset=%lld amount=%d", fd, (Lld)offset, amount);
00352 
00353   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00354     char errbuf[32];
00355     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00356     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00357     return;
00358   }
00359 
00360   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET))
00361       == (uint64_t) -1) {
00362     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset);
00363     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd, (Lld)offset,
00364               errmsg.c_str());
00365     ReportError(cb, (int) offset);
00366     return;
00367   }
00368 
00369   if ((nread = clnt->Read(fdata->fd, (char *) buf.base, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00370     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nread);
00371     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00372               errmsg.c_str());
00373     ReportError(cb, nread);
00374     return;
00375   }
00376 
00377   buf.size = nread;
00378 
00379   cb->response(offset, buf);
00380 }

00386 void KosmosBroker::mkdirs(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *dname) {
00387   String absdir;
00388   String::size_type curr = 0;
00389   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00390   int res = 0;
00391   struct stat statbuf;
00392 
00393   HT_DEBUGF("mkdirs dir='%s'", dname);
00394 
00395   if (dname[0] == '/')
00396     absdir = dname;
00397   else
00398     absdir = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00399 
00400   String path;
00401   while (curr != String::npos) {
00402     curr = absdir.find('/', curr + 1);
00403     if (curr != String::npos)
00404       path.assign(absdir, 0, curr);
00405     else
00406       path = absdir;
00407 
00408     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Stat'ing: " << path << HT_END;
00409 
00410     if (clnt->Stat(path.c_str(), statbuf) == 0) {
00411       if (!S_ISDIR(statbuf.st_mode)) {
00412         res = -ENOTDIR;
00413         break;
00414       }
00415       continue;
00416     }
00417     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Mkdir'ing: " << path << HT_END;
00418 
00419     res = clnt->Mkdir(path.c_str());
00420     if (res < 0)
00421       break;
00422   }
00423 
00424   if (res < 0) {
00425     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00426     HT_ERRORF("mkdirs failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00427     ReportError(cb, res);
00428     return;
00429   }
00430 
00431   cb->response_ok();
00432 }

00438 void KosmosBroker::rmdir(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *dname) {
00439   String absdir;
00440   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00441   int res;
00442 
00443   HT_DEBUGF("rmdir dir='%s'", dname);
00444 
00445   if (dname[0] == '/')
00446     absdir = dname;
00447   else
00448     absdir = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00449 
00450   if ((res = clnt->Rmdirs(absdir.c_str())) != 0) {
00451     if (res != -ENOENT && res != -ENOTDIR) {
00452       string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00453       HT_ERRORF("rmdir failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(),
00454                 errmsg.c_str());
00455       ReportError(cb, res);
00456       return;
00457     }
00458   }
00459 
00460   cb->response_ok();
00461 }

00467 void KosmosBroker::flush(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00468   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00469   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00470   int res;
00471 
00472   HT_DEBUGF("flush fd=%d", fd);
00473 
00474   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00475     char errbuf[32];
00476     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00477     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00478     return;
00479   }
00480 
00481   if ((res = clnt->Sync(fdata->fd)) < 0) {
00482     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00483     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, errmsg.c_str());
00484     ReportError(cb, res);
00485     return;
00486   }
00487 
00488   cb->response_ok();
00489 }

00503 void KosmosBroker::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00504   m_open_file_map.remove_all();
00505   cb->response_ok();
00506   poll(0, 0, 2000);
00507 }

00510 void KosmosBroker::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, const char *dname) {
00511   std::vector<String> listing;
00512   std::vector<String> stripped_listing;
00513   String abs_path;
00514   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00515   int error;
00516 
00517   HT_DEBUGF("readdir dir_name='%s'", dname);
00518 
00519   if (dname[0] == '/')
00520     abs_path = dname;
00521   else
00522     abs_path = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00523 
00524   if ((error = clnt->Readdir(abs_path.c_str(), listing)) < 0) {
00525     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(error);
00526     HT_ERRORF("readdir failed: file='%s' - %s", abs_path.c_str(),
00527               errmsg.c_str());
00528     ReportError(cb, error);
00529     return;
00530   }
00531 
00532   for (size_t i=0;i<listing.size(); i++) {
00533          if (listing[i] == "." || listing[i] == "..")
00534            continue;
00535          stripped_listing.push_back(listing[i]);
00536        }
00537 
00538   HT_INFOF("Sending back %d listings", (int)stripped_listing.size());
00539 
00540   cb->response(stripped_listing);
00541 }

00551     abspath = fname;
00552   else
00553     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;

00556 }

00559 void
00560 KosmosBroker::rename(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *src, const char *dst) {
00561   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00562   int error;
00563 
00564   HT_DEBUGF("rename %s -> %s", src, dst);
00565 
00566   String abs_src =
00567     format("%s%s%s", m_root_dir.c_str(), *src == '/' ? "" : "/", src);
00568   String abs_dst =
00569     format("%s%s%s", m_root_dir.c_str(), *dst == '/' ? "" : "/", dst);
00570 
00571   if ((error = clnt->Rename(src, dst)) < 0)
00572     ReportError(cb, error);
00573   else
00574     cb->response_ok();
00575 }

00578 void
00579 KosmosBroker::debug(ResponseCallback *cb, int32_t command,
00580                     StaticBuffer &serialized_parameters) {
00581   HT_ERRORF("debug command %d not implemented.", command);
00582   cb->error(Error::NOT_IMPLEMENTED, format("Unsupported debug command - %d",
00583             command));
00584 }
00585 
00586 
00590 void KosmosBroker::ReportError(ResponseCallback *cb, int error) {
00591 
00592   string errbuf = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(error);
00593 
00594   if (error == ENOTDIR || error == ENAMETOOLONG || error == ENOENT)
00595     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILENAME, errbuf.c_str());
00596   else if (error == EACCES || error == EPERM)
00597     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_PERMISSION_DENIED, errbuf.c_str());
00598   else if (error == EBADF)
00599     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf.c_str());
00600   else if (error == EINVAL)
00601     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_INVALID_ARGUMENT, errbuf.c_str());
00602   else
00603     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, errbuf.c_str());
00604 }
